
hc_theme_darkunica
Dark Unica theme for highcharts

#### Description 

Dark Unica theme for highcharts

#### Usage 
<pre><code>
hc_theme_darkunica(...)
</code></pre> 
#### Arguments 
 

...
Named argument to modify the theme

#### Examples 
```{r}
highcharts_demo() %>%
hc_add_theme(hc_theme_darkunica())
```
